itemDescription: British environmental scientist and popular science writer

wikipedia_page.main: Dani Rabaiotti is an  English environmental scientist and popular science writer based at the Institute of Zoology at the Zoological Society of London. She is the author (with Nick Caruso) of the New York Times bestseller, Does It Fart, as well as two other books. Her fields of research include global change biology, science policy and science communication.
